title: Rex Ingram: Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse (1921) [Colorized, 4K, 60FPS]

sources.title: 4horsemen 4k
sources.description: Four horsemen of the apocalypse 1921 is a black and white movie film which has been colorised, upscaled to 4K, and frames per second boosted to 60 FPS in 2021 using Artificial Intelligence (A.I) and Google Colab colab.research.google.com/ Technologies used: A.I. Colorizing: //github.com/jantic/DeOldify A.I. Increasing frame rate 60 FPS: //rife-vfi.github.io A.I. Upscaling to 4K: ffmpeg.org GPU: Google Colab
